Lab User Studies to Evaluate the Modifications
Participants signed up in pairs (30 pairs total) Versions cycled through in round robin manner 10 pairs for each version During the study:
One participant was told to send a credit card to the other Participants were given $7 with a $3 bonus to make sure the credit
Afterward, they filled out a survey and were asked questions about their comprehension
Half of the participants who used the original Signal, and the majority of participants who used the modified versions, believed that they completed

Confusion Regarding the Original Authentication Ceremony

I was a little confused at first and I wondered if we needed to be in the same room to scan the QR code to make sure our conversation was secure. At the bottom it just asked if I could switch the conversation to verified and so I did.

I hit [the button] and then I was like, well that did nothing and so I hit it again and nothing happened...I hit verify and then it says that I just unhit it immediately afterwards...I was just like, verify what? What am I verifying? It didnt really tell me...Honestly it meant nothing.
